title: MOOC Learning Experience Design Using Wearable Technology: Strengthening Social Studies Instructional Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental usage of online learning platforms and core social studies concepts
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service/in-service teachers integrating wearable technology (smartwatches, fitness trackers, etc.) into social studies MOOCs to enhance learning immersion and technological competency

learning_goals: Learners improve learning focus in social studies MOOCs by 20% or more using real-time biometric data collected from wearable devices.
Learners achieve at least 90% completion of social phenomenon analysis tasks by integrating mobile apps with wearable device technology.
Learners design at least one social studies MOOC lecture module applying wearable technology-based learning experience principles.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
